ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] coolest emotes
ygData.msgSnippet: This one nearly got the group killed as several player s were laughing too hard to fight. /em Looks oddly at his horn, let s out a few choice curses and begins
ygData.messageBody:
This one nearly got the group killed as several player's were laughing too
hard to fight.

/em Looks oddly at his horn, let's out a few choice curses and begins to
beat A Mountain Giant Hillock about the knees with the damn thing.

This was after a string of about 20 resists or missed notes while trying to
do all instruments at the giant castle in Frontier Mountains. And yes, my
stupid brass skill was maxed for my previous level, had just Dinged though
so needed those 5 new points yet.

Kitasi Faegehearper


-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 9:34 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] coolest emotes


--- "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...> wrote:
> hehe, this makes me want to start a shamen :)

Heheh, when I get a buff or somebody is nice to me, I
do a /e sings a song praising ...

pretty humdrum IMHO. Best emotes I've seen are:

/e pulls a multi colored cube from his pocket, twists
it until all the facets match and puts it away

and

/e kicks mob in the jimmy for 113 points of damage
(done by a halfling fighting a cycolps)

would love to see what bardic emotes are used by list readers...
